WorkItem.Description:
Environment: VS2010 + SP1 Beta + Chirpy v2.0

Reproduce:
1. Open Tools > Options > Chirpy > Config
  if this is the first time you open it, everything looks fine.
2. Close the option dialog
3. Reopen Tools > Options > Chirpy > Config
  now, there are twice items in each combo box, the more you try, the more items there are!


Seems it should do a cmbXXX.Items.Clear() in Zippy.Chirp.ConfigurationScreen.Config.OnAfterCreated(DTE DTEObject)
WorkItem.Summary: bug?: combobox items added repeatedly in Chirpy v2.0
